description:
Beyoncé: Fumi has recently been engrossed with world superstar Beyoncé. She imitates Beyoncé, shows off her belly button, does Monroe walk - she starts to act like her. One day...; Mugi minus 1: The familiar five boys - the Mugi family. But for some reason today, there`s one less! It looks like he ran away from home. While Bunji is out doing groceries, he coincedentally meets with the third Mugi boy. (3rd boy in family); Borsch (Ukraine dish): 
When Mom comes back late from work, Dad decides to cook dinner. What`s on the menu is borsch. There was a time when Dad was in Siberia and he ate it with his body freezing - it was something that is out of the world. That is what he`s trying to reproduce. ; What`s in the warehouse (part of mom`s jokes): Mom`s funny story. Bunji happens to be in a fish and rice shop. (NOT fish and chips). Bunji has an interesting way of eating his favorite ramen but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beyonce / Mugi Minus One / Borsch / Warehouse of Jokes
ビヨンセ / 麦マイナス1 / ボルシチ / お蔵出し
